trans-unit.source: Manages security tokens for the client.
This class handles security token serialization, security token provision and security token authentication for the client.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen behandler sikkerhet token serialisering, sikkerhet token klargjøring og sikkerhet token godkjenning for klienten.

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of this class for each client channel factory.
trans-unit.target: Det er en forekomst av denne klassen for hver klienten kanal til fabrikkinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> object allows the user to configure client credentials to be used for authentication to the service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>objektet tillater brukeren å konfigurere klienten legitimasjonen som skal brukes for godkjenning til tjenesten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> is responsible for validating security tokens and providing a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> to obtain claims for security tokens that meet the requirements specified in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator>Er ansvarlig for å validere sikkerhetstokener og leverer en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>hente krav for sikkerhet tokener som oppfyller kravene som er angitt i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class is responsible for obtaining tokens for a given <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>Klassen er ansvarlig for å hente token for en gitt <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Optionally token providers support renewing and canceling tokens as well.
trans-unit.target: Eventuelt token leverandører støtte fornye og avbryte samt spesialtegn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> is used to write and read security tokens, security key identifiers, and security key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>brukes til å skrive og lese sikkerhetstokener, sikkerhet key identifikatorer og sikkerhet nøkkel-ID-setningsdeler.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: When deserializing the token from XML, the returned token must be able to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering av token fra XML, må det returnerte tokenet kunne utføre kryptografiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer therefore must ensure the deserialized token can perform cryptographic operations (Kerberos ticket processing, X.509 decoding, SAML decoding and other operations) but should defer application trust decisions to the security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Token serialiseringen derfor må kontrollere deserialisert tokenet kan utføre kryptografiske operasjoner (Kerberos billett behandling, X.509 dekoding, SAML dekoding og andre operasjoner), men bør utsette programmet klarering avgjørelsene til sikkerhet token godkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> is used to write and read security tokens, security key identifiers and security key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>brukes til å skrive og lese sikkerhetstokener, sikkerhet key identifikatorer og sikkerhet nøkkel-ID-setningsdeler.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: When deserializing the token from XML, the returned token must be able to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering av token fra XML, må det returnerte tokenet kunne utføre kryptografiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The token serializer therefore must ensure the deserialized token can perform cryptographic operations (Kerberos ticket processing, X.509 decoding, SAML decoding and other operations) but should defer application trust decisions to the security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Token serialiseringen derfor må kontrollere deserialisert tokenet kan utføre kryptografiske operasjoner (Kerberos billett behandling, X.509 dekoding, SAML dekoding og andre operasjoner), men bør utsette programmet klarering avgjørelsene til sikkerhet token godkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified token requirement is an issued security token requirement.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om det angitte token kravet er et token utstedte sikkerhetskrav.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified token requirement is an issued security token requirement; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte token kravet er et utstedte token sikkerhetskrav; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
